snippet: Without thinking, we consumers relieve businesses of their responsibilities and foolishly take them on ourselves.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Daniel Akst calls attention to proliferation of indemnification clauses that consumers are required to sign; criticizes these unfair agreements, which often relieve businesses and institutions of their most basic responsibilities.
lead_paragraph: Without thinking, we consumers relieve businesses of their responsibilities and foolishly take them on ourselves.

headline.seo: Those Crazy Indemnity Forms We All Sign
